entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Infinity Tank Battle
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $9.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Golden PassÔºö$1.99
  • 200 TicketsÔºö$4.99
  • 50 TicketsÔºö$1.99
  • 500 TicketsÔºö$9.99

Application Description

Tank Battle is very popular TV game since 8-bit console present. From 2012, we develop "Super Tank Battle" and provide 500 maps to player. Many people play it day by day. Now we using a new game engine to offer new game "Infinity Tank Battle". Infinity Tank Battle is a brand new tank battle game. It is following various classic essential features, and add some new interesting elements. Core Game Rule: - Defence your base - Destroy all enemy tanks Key Features: - Different type of enemy - Different type of Map style - Special items - Auto Helper tank - Import Super Tank Battle 500 Legend maps Infinity Tank Battle will continue update, our target is over 1000 map. And this game is cross-platform, you can find it on mobile, PC, and Mac.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Chord
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.99 [$0.29 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

Application Description

This app plus your ears equals complete freedom in writing music! A comprehensive set of tools for any musician: * Chord Progression: Create beautiful chord progressions with full flexibility - use inversions, sus2, sus4, 7th, 9th, and more. Enjoy live playback as piano or synth, or send MIDI directly to your macOS computer! * MIDI Keyboard: Transform your phone into a MIDI keyboard for your macOS computer (compatible with macOS Catalina and newer). * Notation Practice: Practice reading notes in both treble and bass clefs. * Chord Calculation: Help you learn how to calculate chords and progressions. * Interval Practice: Practice recognizing and comparing musical intervals by ear. * Voice & Ear Training: Simple, effective tools for voice practice and ear training. * Harmonic Match - helps you mix tracks in key while DJing. Plus, enjoy the macOS version included with your purchase!

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Black Border 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.49 ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Inspect papers, prevent smuggling‚Äîkeep the border safe or profit from corruption. Ready to become a Border Police Officer? Step into the world of Black Border 2: Border Patrol Simulator and experience the intense pressure of national security. As a Customs Officer, your duty is to protect the nation from illegal smuggling. Inspect passports, scrutinize documents, and use advanced tools to make life-or-death decisions in this gripping police simulator game. Take on the duty of a Border Patrol Agent and protect your nation's borders. Your role is crucial: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports, permits, and papers to approve or reject entrants. Advanced Tools: Utilize X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and weigh stations to check vehicle legitimacy. Canine Unit: Deploy your loyal service dog to sniff out concealed contraband and uncover secrets. Strategic Decisions: Every choice you make impacts the safety of your country. NEW FEATURES in Black Border 2: Document Inspection: Meticulously check passports and permits to approve or reject entrants as a customs officer. Endless Mode: Test your border patrol skills in a nonstop, challenging experience. Bus Arrivals: Manage large buses and check every passenger's documents carefully. Advanced Scanning: Utilize new X-ray scanners to reveal hidden items and contraband. Weigh Stations: Ensure vehicle weights match their records, a key part of your police duty. Canine Unit: Your faithful service dog is now a crucial partner in finding hidden contraband. Each day as a border inspector brings new challenges that will push your customs police skills to the limit. Are you ready to face the pressure and become a true hero of national security? Download Black Border 2 today and get ready to defend the nation!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Inkblade Idlers: Wuxia RPG
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$3.99 ‚Üí $0.99 [$0.99 ~ $3.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$0.99

In-App Purchases

  • 1000 Redemption TicketsÔºö$9.99
  • 80 Redemption TicketsÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Welcome to "Inkblade Idlers", where the serene beauty of ink-wash painting meets the thrilling world of wuxia martial arts in an idle RPG adventure. Effortless Progression, Deep Strategy Your heroes train and battle automatically, earning silver and experience even when you are offline. Return to spend resources on powerful skills, legendary weapons, and rare manuals to push your team further. Conquer Mighty Bosses, Collect Secret Manuals Face towering martial arts masters in epic showdowns. Each victory unlocks ancient secret manuals that teach your heroes unique and devastating abilities to customize your combat style. Manage Your Martial World Upgrade your shop to increase income, expand your backpack to hold more treasures, and strategically equip your team. Every decision strengthens your path to becoming the ultimate martial arts legend. Key Features: - Breathtaking ink-wash art inspired by traditional Chinese painting - True idle gameplay with progress happening 24/7 - Collect and customize hundreds of weapons, armor, and martial arts manuals - Strategic management of shops, resources, and inventory - Challenging boss fights against powerful martial arts masters Download Inkblade Idlers now and begin your tranquil yet powerful journey to martial arts supremacy. No grinding required.

entry.title: SmallFish Chess for Stockfish
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$4.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $4.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

Application Description

SmallFish is a project based on the Stockfish chess engine. It uses the latest Stockfish chess engine (Stockfish 17.1), rated about Elo 3600+ and is the strongest chess app on the App Store. SmallFish offers you three distinct ways to improve your game. You can review your game with comments, or study how Stockfish thinks, or track your progress. No in-app purchase, no ads, no data tracking. SmallFish is simply amazing. It's small but powerful, you'll be surprised. Features --------- - Blunder checking - Multiple line analysis - Graphical evaluation of your game - Game previews - Dark mode support - Endgame tablebase - Opening books Why not just download and try it yourself?

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: NotePad++ - Pro
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced ToolsÔºö$9.99 ‚Üí $4.99 [$0.99 ~ $9.99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.99

In-App Purchases

  • Notepad Pro+ Advanced ToolsÔºö$4.99

Application Description

Notepad++ - Smart Notes, Secure Data & PDF Manager Notepad++ helps you save, organize, and protect your important notes, memos, and favorite data in one powerful app. Create notes with different colors, images, font styles, and font sizes to match your needs and stay organized effortlessly. With iCloud Sync, your notes are safely stored in iCloud so you can access, restore, or delete them anytime, directly from the app. Notepad++ also includes a Today‚Äôs Notes Widget that displays the current date and gives timely notifications, helping you stay on top of your daily tasks and reminders. In addition to fast and simple note-taking, Notepad++ now includes a built-in PDF Editor & Manager, making it easier to work with documents in one place. Key Features:- - Notes & Organization ‚Ä¢ Unlimited notes storage ‚Ä¢ Multiple note colors ‚Ä¢ Pinned & private notes ‚Ä¢ Custom font styles & font sizes ‚Ä¢ Sort notes by name or date ‚Ä¢ Auto-delete notes after a selected time ‚Ä¢ Easy note sharing ‚Ä¢ One-tap quick note creation - Security ‚Ä¢ App lock with multiple passcode options ‚Ä¢ Touch ID & Face ID support - iCloud Sync ‚Ä¢ iCloud sync for notes ‚Ä¢ Retrieve or delete notes from iCloud - Widgets & Notifications ‚Ä¢ Widget for today‚Äôs notes ‚Ä¢ Notifications for daily notes & reminders - PDF Editor & Manager ‚Ä¢ Create and manage PDF files ‚Ä¢ Edit existing PDFs ‚Ä¢ Export notes as PDF ‚Ä¢ Share PDFs easily ‚Ä¢ Add signatures and stamps to PDFs ‚Ä¢ Store and organize PDFs in one place Note down anything, anytime, anywhere with just one tap and never miss an important thought or reminder again with smart notifications. Note: All your data is stored locally on your device. We do not access, collect, or store your data. Your privacy is fully protected. Thank you for using this app. We‚Äôre committed to improving your experience with every update. Keep writing and stay organized!

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Wall of insanity
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$2.99 ‚Üí $1.49 [$0.39 ~ $2.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö$1.49

Application Description

Wall of Insanity is a new project from the creators of the Slaughter game series. It features a dark storyline, intense action, and a mystical journey into a dead, smoldering world. You will face the unknown. A descent into a kingdom of anxiety and madness. The path through the abyss will be difficult, the trek extremely dangerous, and you will be left almost hopeless. Story: A police operation to detain a dangerous cult's sectarians leads to unexpectedly deadly consequences. That squad vanished under mysterious circumstances, and the Special Unit soldiers sent in to investigate their disappearance find just an empty, abandoned house. This is only where the story begins... Key Features: - Active battles with the use of firearms. Survival depends on caution, reaction speed, and weapon accuracy. Use elements of the environment itself to escape this horrific world. - A journey to another world where fear, sorrow, and madness rule. A diligently crafted, ominous environment, fraught with mystery and danger, lies ahead of you. How far will you dare to go? - A plethora of traps and enemies await around every corner. Investigate your surroundings carefully. Don't take unnecessary risks. Study your enemies. Carefully selected tactics will save your ammunition. And your life. - Explore the world to replenish and expand your arsenal. Weapons and useful items will be needed. Look for secrets, documents, and workarounds to prevail against all odds. - Wall of Insanity features simple controls, gamepad support, good optimization, and a wide graphics customization.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DotInk: EInk Assistant
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$1.99 ‚Üí Free [Free ~ $1.99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • Yearly ProÔºö$5.99
  • Lifetime ProÔºö$14.99
  • Monthly ProÔºö$0.99

Application Description

Designed for e-ink enthusiasts, making your portable readers more powerful and easier to use. Seamlessly convert .ttf fonts and e-books on your phone into .bin fonts, XTC, or EPUB formats perfectly tuned for portable e-ink screens. [CORE FEATURES] ‚Ä¢ WYSIWYG Font Customization Import external .ttf fonts or use system fonts. Adjust line spacing, tracking, size, weight, and more with precision. Real-time simulation of various e-ink screens‚Äîpreview exactly how it looks before exporting. ‚Ä¢ Powerful E-book Toolbox Import various e-book formats to preview layouts directly on your phone. Customize formatting and convert to standard formats with a single tap. ‚Ä¢ Seamless Device Integration Wireless connection to supported devices for font pushing and file management. Supported Devices: XTEInk X4, EDCBook, Murphy 3.7, Wudada¬∑Little Ink, and more. ‚Ä¢ Privacy First & Offline 100% Offline: All processing is done locally on your device. No user data is ever uploaded. (Note: Network and Location permissions are required solely for connecting to your e-ink hardware.) [NOTE FROM DEVELOPER] This app is an indie project built with "AI Vibe Coding." While I strive for perfection, I cannot test every scenario. If you encounter any bugs, I appreciate your understanding. Thank you to all the "Community Supporters" for your feedback! Feel free to leave suggestions or comments. Terms of Use (EULA): https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
